text: Savage Land is a fictional land. == Wildlife == The fauna of the Savage Land consists of prehistoric creatures which are extinct in rest of the world. The Nuwali created the Savage Land and stocked it with many kinds of extinct animals from the Triassic to the Pleistocene until they stopped maintaining the Savage Lands. * Coelophysis * Ankylosaurus * Apatosaurus * Archaeopteryx * Arsinoitherium * Brachiosaurus * Dimetrodon * Dire wolf * Doedicurus * Elasmosaurus * Mastodon * Eohippus * Iguanodon * Nothosaurus * Ornithomimus * Pteranodon * Pterodactyl * Smilodon * Stegosaurus * Styracosaurus * Trilophodon * Synthetoceras * Therizinosaurus * Triceratops * Trilobite * Tylosaurus * Tyrannosaurus * Velociraptor * Woolly mammoth * Dinohyus * Woolly rhinoceros * Zeuglodon * Spinosaurus * Paraceratherium * Utahraptor * Ceratosaurus * Allosaurus * Oviraptor * Tarbosaurus * Dilophosaurus * Plateosaurus * Amargasaurus * Diplodocus * Chasmosaurus * Protoceratops * Pachycephalosaurus * Maiasaura * Parasaurolophus * Othnielia * Archelon * Quetzalcoatlus * Lystrosaurus * Flying lizard * Gorgonopsid * Moschops * Megalodon * Uintatherium * Ornithocheirus Category:Fictional locations Category:X-Men
title: Savage Land
